info.name: Dev's Dark StackOverflow
info.additionalInfo:
Tested with Chrome 52 & Stylish Extension

- 1.1.2
   - added new answer activity bar styling

- 1.1.1
   - added some more missing styling in documentation etc.

- 1.1.0
   - added styling for the new navigation menu topbar

- 1.0.5
   - resolved issue with color animation of linked answer (#1, thanks to MDTech-us-MAN)

- 1.0.4
   - added two new entries for new comments and user reputation items

- 1.0.3
   - adjusted some colors and added some missing styles; put style to github at https://github.com/swalex/userstyles

- 1.0.2
  - dimmed/recolored the job boxes

- 1.0.1
  - fixed background color issue for question status blocks

- First "Release" 1.0

data.title: Very nice dark theme, easy on the eyes
Very well done. Easy on the eyes and very readable!
Looks very nice but has some minor issues
To fix it, edit style and change every .so-header to .top-bar
